cells.data:
1. Self-introduction

My name is  Zhengbin and you can call me Robin, I am from China, I have done my bachelor degree computer science and previous master degree information security in beijing jiaotong university. Now I am  a graduate student from Santa clara university, majored in computer science and engineering. My currently concentration is web development, and I am also solid in Java programming.I wanna be a full-stack developer in the future.

What’s more, I am self-motivated and enjoy working in a team environment. I am also a hard worker and quick learner.I’m looking for an opportunity to work for a growing company where I can contribute my hands-on experience and grow my career with the company. Thank you for giving me this interview opportunity,that’s all about me

2. About project 

1. Vending Machine Project is  the most impressive project I’va ever done

I developed a Vending Machine Background Web Site. It’s a online vending machine system, which has two main part, the first part which  we used a android cell-phone to act as a vending machine, we can buy item by phone.

The second part is a background website, that is what I do,It is used to allow employee to register and login, including the CRUD function. Employees work on each vending machine to register the machine, add or delete item from machine and refill machine when it needed.  The Monitoring website is also able to get all the statistics, including items, machine and sales information.

The fronted end use bootstrap jQuery and ejs template,The backend is written in a Nodejs,and using node framework expressjs 

The difficult part is the integration part since there are a lot of modules working together. For example ,the backend website, the frontend android client and the communication server.To conquer it, I read a lot of helper document and talk with my group member for many times.You know I am totally new to Nodejs,and  few people in our team have experience in it,  the other difficult part would be asynchronous programming. What I am  probably used to is writing a recipe that the computer executes in the order you instruct it. That's simply not how asynchronous code works; it can execute differently each time depending on how long a request takes, how big a file being read is, etc.

2Behavioral Question

0.Why Zazzle

You know, Zazzle is one of the good growing e-commerce companies every year. As a fresher every one wish to join in reputed company in order to improve their practical knowledge. According to my view zazzle provides a great opportunity for me in order to gain practical knowledge and good environment.I am truly passionate about the work zazzle provide.and I really like Zazzla's company mission ,I notice that the mission is :To Enable Every Custom, On-Demand Product in the World On zazzle.” And I like the Zazzle’s business model, like a perfect make Engine, is creating both the tools and the marketplace for anything people can imagine – customized. 

1. most interesting problem you solved; 

Let me think, I think the most interesting problem I solved is one of  a algorithm problem, which call dungeon game,
In this algorithm problem, The demons had captured the princess  and imprisoned her in the bottom-right corner of a dungeon, and the dungeon is a 2D matrix, and our task goal is find a way from top-left matrix to  through the dungeon to rescue the princess. I spend a long time to think how to solved this problem from a programming view, , and finally I I use dynamic programming algorithm to tackle  this problem.Since this problem give me a feeling I was like really solve the realistic world thing, so I thinkg it’s pretty interesting.

2. mistake you made before; 
I think the worst mistake I ever made at work was in my first internship, I was given a project to complete in a week.  I understood the project, but I misinterpreted one section.  After completing the project, I was told by my manager that it was done incorrectly.  I really made a mistake by assuming incorrectly in one of the sections instead of asking for clarification.  From this mistake, I learned not to assume through the mistake I made."

3. how do you handle relationship with colleagues
At first  communicate effectively is very important because I think the foundation of every good relationship is solid communication. we also need  to know our co-worker.Since one of the best ways to build positive relationships is to make time to learn about people.We should Be reliable and have a positive attitude, sometimes we need to Cope with conflict. That’s  how I usuallly handle relationship with colleagues

4.How do you expect salary
 You know I am a fresher. Salary is not first priority for me. I just wanna a  big Platform to start my career and I also want to improve my Knowledge and skill and gain experience. So I expect a considerable according to my ability and your company normal standard which can fulfill my economical needs.If I need to say a exactly number, maybe 100-110 thousands

5.How do you feel about working nights and weekends?
I am a fresher so I would like to have much experience so I would like to work in night shifts and weekends. Company growth is my growth. So I like to work in any situation.

3.About work

1.Beijing Jiaotong University

In this work, I am a student research assistant  ,you konw my major is information security and the work is more relate to biometric security. during that time, I am  focusing on the existing remote authentication scheme based on biological characteristics, like finger print and palmprint. At my work I also analyzed the safety defects of different biometirc security system, then develop  a new blind identity authentication scheme based on palmprint. The scheme can effectively solve issues on user privacy, template protection and intentity trust. 

2. NEC Software Technology                                                                                                                                      

In this work, I am a Software Engineer Intern, build a management application for supply chain system that is used externally by suppliers. It is a user friendly, Single-Page web application with real-time performance for editing, creating, listing and paging.
